explains: v. （使）变宽，加宽；（使）扩展，程度加深，范围扩大；（尤因惊讶或恐惧而眼睛）睁大

sentences.en: They may have to widen the road to cope with the increase in traffic.
sentences.cn: 他们可能得拓宽这条道路以适应车辆的增多。

sentences.en: The favored proposal of the motorists' lobby is to widen the highway, adding an additional lane of traffic.
sentences.cn: 驾车者游说团赞成的建议是拓宽高速公路，增加一条额外的车道。

sentences.en: I know some teachers do use photocopied newspaper articles sometimes, as their students are eager to learn more to widen their views.
sentences.cn: 我知道有些老师有时会复印报纸上的文章，因为他们的学生渴望学习更多东西来开阔自己的眼界。
